# documentVisibleRect

**Instance Property**

The portion of the document view, in its own coordinate system, visible through the scroll view’s content view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var documentVisibleRect: NSRect { get }
```

## Related Documentation

- **documentVisibleRect**: The exposed rectangle of the clip view’s document view, in the document view’s own coordinate system.
- **visibleRect**: The portion of the view that isn’t clipped by its superviews.

## Determining Component Sizes

- **contentSize**: The size of the scroll view’s content view.
